title: What Is Ops-Trust? (Ep 1713)
description:
What is Ops-Trust? You need to hear the answer. In this episode? I address the scandal. I also discuss the war in Ukraine and the failures of the Biden administration to present a plan. 

News Picks:

What is “Ops-Trust”? 

Putin may have overplayed his hand in Ukraine. 


Here’s how the Ukrainian army stacks up against the Russian army. 


Joy Behar humiliates herself while discussing the Ukraine crisis.
